author: courant.com
title: Horse Ranches, Vineyards & Farms For Sale In Connecticut - Hartford
text:
Caption 959 North St., Suffield Courtesy of Zillow.com Offering 28 acres, this horse property is complete with a three-bed home and a seven-stall barn. It offers several other amenities of a modern working farm in the heart of Suffield. The cost: $1.5 million. Check out the Zillow.com listing for more photos and information.
